name: Fullstack Dev
tagline: Everything you need, ready to go
description: Complete development environment for building modern web applications. Includes Docker, databases, and all the tools a fullstack developer needs.
longDescription: The Fullstack Developer profile provides a comprehensive development environment ready for building modern web applications from frontend to backend. This setup includes everything from code editors and browsers to containerization tools and database clients. Whether you're building APIs, microservices, or full web applications, this profile has you covered with industry-standard tools that work together seamlessly.

seo.title: Fullstack Developer Linux Setup | OmniSet
seo.description: Set up a complete fullstack development environment on Linux with OmniSet. Includes VS Code, Docker, Chrome, databases, and more. One command setup.
